product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Chaos 2 Tent - Special Buy
long_description: The freestanding ALPS Mountaineering Chaos 2 Tent features a single continuous pole design, 2 mesh doors for easy entry and 2 vestibules for gear storage and weather protection. Freestanding pole system with 7000-series aluminum poles; tent assembles easily with pole clips that quickly snap over the tent poles. 75-denier coated taffeta floor; 75-denier polyester fly resists UV damage and stays taut. Factory sealed fly and floor seams offer weather protection. Extra large #8 zippers on doors and vestibules. Full-coverage weatherproof fly buckles to the tent for maximum adjustability and protection. Mesh roof vents increase ventilation and allow stargazing. Extra guyouts on the fly stabilize the tent in bad weather. The ALPS Mountaineering Chaos 2 Tent comes with a tent bag, pole bag, stake bag, aluminum stakes, guylines and repair swatches. Special buy.
short_description: The freestanding ALPS Mountaineering Chaos 2 Tent features a single continuous pole design, 2 mesh doors for easy entry and 2 vestibules for gear storage and weather protection.
